name: Chichen Excursion Playa
description: The fastest and most efficient way to get to magnificent Chichen Itza, our private tour will take you directly from your Playa del Carmen hotel door to the most magnificent of the Mayan ruins sites in the area.  Along the way, you can stop in Valladolid for shopping if you like, or visit the famous cenote of Ik Kil, where you can swim and cool off.
